attributes.action: Give Guardian Angels full Police powers and the power of arrest to fight crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please Mr Brown can you please give the Guardian Angels full Police powers so that they can perform the jobs that the police cannot be bothered to do themselves, aswell as special powers to tackles anti social behavior and apprehend sexual predators give reasonable force if necessary

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
